meta.intent_analysis: 直感型の職人。短髪・手の傷・油汚れ・工具と工房環境を強調し、『手の記憶』を視覚中心に表現。

prompt_payload.positive_prompt: Japanese technical college girl, Akasaka Mina, age 15-16, petite with toned arms, short slightly messy black hair (ear-length) tied back for safety, big round curious brown eyes, healthy tanned skin. Wearing proper Japanese workwear coveralls (sagyougi/tsunagi) in grey with work boots, safety goggles, sleeves rolled, leather wrist band; no gloves to show hands. Hands display small scratches, band-aids, oil stains and calluses (hands as focal point). Operating a bench drill press correctly: right hand on feed lever, workpiece securely clamped in a drill vise on the table, left hand on the vise handle or near the stop, safe distance from the rotating bit; metal chips visible on table. Warm industrial daylight in mechanical workshop at Kamishiro Kosen, realistic tooling and fixtures, focused expression and proper posture. Gentle anime illustration emphasizing craftsmanship, safety, and hands; consistent identity tokens: short messy black hair, tanned skin, coveralls, safety goggles
prompt_payload.negative_prompt: hoodie casual wear, fashion outfit, clean soft hands, long loose hair near machine, delicate dainty look, frilly dress, sterile lab only, bookish theoretical setting, cold blue lighting, incorrect tool use, holding workpiece by hand, using wrench on spindle/chuck, freehand drilling, hands near spinning tool, unsafe posture, missing safety goggles, text, caption, subtitles, overlay, words, letters, typography, UI, sidebar, frame, border, watermark, logo, signature, bad anatomy, extra fingers, extra limbs, mutation, deformed, blurry, lowres

advanced_config.instructions_for_tool: Do NOT render any text, captions, labels, overlays, frames or borders. Use proper workwear coveralls and safety goggles. Pose: bench drill press operation with right hand on feed lever; workpiece clamped in drill vise; left hand on vise handle/stop; hands away from spinning bit. Show realistic metal chips and fixtures. No wrench on spindle/chuck; no freehand drilling; no gloves (keep hands visible).
